summary: Diff adds Spades multi-hand scoring utilities (target=500, hand scoring, winner determination), extends Spades state to track persistent totalScore/handNumber, and updates the Spades engine/UI to support a 500-point target flow. Due to truncation of key modified files, some acceptance-criteria behaviors (auto-starting new hands and game-over gating) cannot be fully verified from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a `RENEGE_PENALTY` constant in Spades scoring module that is not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on playing to 500 points and implementing hand/total scoring; it does not mention adding or changing renege penalty constants.
